data.text: - The true moment for me was when

translation.text: - Khoảnh khắc thực sự đối với tôi là khi

data.text: we were living in San Jose, California.

translation.text: chúng tôi đã sống ở San Jose, California.

data.text: One night, Ashley was out running errands

translation.text: Một đêm nọ, Ashley ra ngoài chạy việc vặt

data.text: and I was putting Claire to bed

translation.text: và tôi đang đặt Claire lên giường

data.text: and I sang her the song and then Claire sang it back to me,

translation.text: và tôi đã hát cho cô ấy nghe bài hát và sau đó Claire hát lại cho tôi nghe.

data.text: and I just remember thinking that was incredible.

translation.text: và tôi chỉ nhớ rằng đó là không thể tin được.

data.text: And so I call up Ashley on the phone,

translation.text: Và vì vậy tôi gọi cho Ashley qua điện thoại,

data.text: she was out running errands, and I just told her.

translation.text: Cô ấy đang chạy việc vặt, và tôi chỉ nói với cô ấy.

data.text: I was like, this girl can sing.

- I thought it was cute.
Ashley thought it was cute.
Grandma and Grandpa thought it was cute.
We all thought it was adorable,
but I didn't think much of it because
I'm keenly aware of this solid fact,
and that is that cuteness in kids is all relative.
Meaning that if the kid is your relative
then you think it's cute.
- A question that's plagued parents forever,
is my baby really as cute as I think?
- We think she is actually the cutest baby to ever be born.
People have said that to us.
- You know they say that to every baby.
- Actually, they were telling the truth.
- [Male Announcer] What is it
that makes parents so delusional?
- I don't know.
We just feel that she actually is that cute.

- This is going to be so random.
I say, hey, were not getting oil changed
we're just making a video.
So random.
- You're not wrong Claire.
This is the thing we want show these people something.
I want to show them where it happened.
This is a Jiffy Lube.
This is where the light bulb went on.
It wasn't this Jiffy Lube but it was a Jiffy Lube.
So as I stand up to the counter to pay
with a nice gentleman like this
I turn around, Claire is just singing her heart out
to "The Little Mermaid" song.
Putting her arms out, she's doing all the actions,
as I look back all these people
in the waiting room were laughing
and there's this girl who whips out her cellphone
and she starts filming Claire's performance.
And she's just laughing, this is amazing.
That girl's out there somewhere
and she's got this video on her phone.
I wish I could find her and I wish I could get that video.
So as I'm sitting there, that girl is recording
her performance with her cellphone.
It's like the light bulb went on in my mind
and my wind was just like boosh.

- I already had a YouTube channel.
I was already uploading videos.
So, I had everything I needed.
I had a microphone, a laptop, a preamp,
chords, lots more chords, a camera, lens.
I had everything I needed to start a YouTube channel.
I just needed to do it with Claire,
and so in January 2016 we uploaded our very first video.

- I was working at Amazon at the time,
and we had this big conference
down in Los Angles called NAMM.
All the musical instrument vendors gather
for meetings and all sorts of crazy stuff.
So, I was in meetings all day long.
My phone was just blowing up.
I had family calling me, I had friends calling me --

- Did you have a blast?

data.text: Oh man it just felt so good and just so proud of her.

data.text: - So precious!

data.text: - Whoa! - Precious!

data.text: This world is so beautiful.

data.text: - So we do get the question all the time,

translation.text: - Vì vậy, chúng tôi nhận được câu hỏi tất cả các thời gian,

data.text: when is Carson going to join Claire singing?

translation.text: Khi nào Carson sẽ tham gia hát Claire?

data.text: And what is Carson interested in?

translation.text: Và Carson quan tâm đến điều gì?

data.text: So, the most important thing to us

translation.text: Vì vậy, điều quan trọng nhất đối với chúng tôi

data.text: in this journey is that our kids,

translation.text: trong hành trình này là những đứa trẻ của chúng tôi,

data.text: we can help them develop talents

translation.text: chúng ta có thể giúp họ phát triển tài năng

data.text: in what they are most interested in

translation.text: trong những gì họ quan tâm nhất

data.text: and never forcing them to do things

translation.text: và không bao giờ ép buộc họ làm việc

data.text: they are uncomfortable with

translation.text: họ không thoải mái với

data.text: or things that maybe they just don't want to do,

data.text: and so she's had these opportunities

translation.text: và vì vậy cô ấy đã có những cơ hội

data.text: so we've just rolled with it and we've done as much
